body: Hi all, I came across bake problem after shadow range analysis. see as below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zMlnaV6uwW9eIh2q-CGyQmpQklWSDcsFb-Ia2MtZetM7pxcV3bquYh8AJHHX34bpOo0OaV4FJ6SBdyrmfJoZvpFGaPJyOwWc/resultsforshadingdesign.jpg) Fig 1: The normal result I got [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/zMlnaV6uwW9dE9FDhkDQSChJfMpnR1gT5o2vn67j8nLcxHdSzZVpyfN82aqvTkBOF6qB-LICQvbgi-mD3YQBN7jnBETmE-HV/Bakingproblem.jpg) Fig 2: Failure of baking Can anyone help? Thanks in advance!
topic: Bake problem in shadow range analysis
